name: Taj Mahal
description: The Taj Mahal is an ivory-white marble mausoleum on the southern bank of the river Yamuna in the Indian city of Agra.

name: Machu Picchu
description: Machu Picchu is a 15th-century Inca citadel located in the Eastern Cordillera of southern Peru.
